note.p: Publisher and journalist. Son of David Bogue (1808–56). Publisher’s clerk, 1871; publisher, Hardwicke and Bogue, 1876; David Bogue, 1879. Declared bankrupt in 1882, but continued as a publisher until 1885; later worked as a journalist on the Daily Graphic.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/861/28/23), 1881 (RG11/188/100/22), 1891 (RG12/548/99/11)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 20 March 2019)
London Gazette, 15 September 1882, pp. 4285–6; 20 May 1885, p. 2502
